data.name: Create.Header
data.value:
-- Set the subscriber names at the bottom of the script, then execute this script on the publisher to create replication -- on the {0} database.
-- Enabling the replication database exec sp_replicationdboption @dbname = N'{0}', @optname = N'publish', @value = N'true' GO
use [{0}] GO
-- Adding the transactional publication exec sp_addpublication @publication = N'{0}', @sync_method = N'concurrent', @retention = 0, @allow_push = N'true', @allow_pull = N'true', @allow_anonymous = N'true', @enabled_for_internet = N'false', @snapshot_in_defaultfolder = N'true', @compress_snapshot = N'false', @allow_subscription_copy = N'false', @add_to_active_directory = N'false', @repl_freq = N'continuous', @status = N'active', @independent_agent = N'true', @immediate_sync = N'true', @allow_sync_tran = N'false', @autogen_sync_procs = N'false', @allow_queued_tran = N'false', @allow_dts = N'false', @replicate_ddl = 1, @allow_initialize_from_backup = N'false', @enabled_for_p2p = N'false', @enabled_for_het_sub = N'false' GO
-- Add a snapshot
exec sp_addpublication_snapshot @publication = N'{0}', @frequency_type = 1, @frequency_interval = 0, @frequency_relative_interval = 0, @frequency_recurrence_factor = 0, @frequency_subday = 0, @frequency_subday_interval = 0, @active_start_time_of_day = 0, @active_end_time_of_day = 235959, @active_start_date = 0, @active_end_date = 0, @job_login = null, @job_password = null, @publisher_security_mode = 0, @publisher_login = N'sa', @publisher_password = N'{1}' GO
-- Adding the transactional articles

data.name: Create.Subscriber
data.value:
-- Add subscriber {2}
use [{0}] GO
exec sp_addsubscription @publication = N'{0}', @subscriber = N'{2}', @destination_db = N'{0}', @subscription_type = N'Push', @sync_type = N'replication support only', @article = N'all', @update_mode = N'read only', @subscriber_type = 0
exec sp_addpushsubscription_agent @publication = N'{0}', @subscriber = N'{2}', @subscriber_db = N'{0}', @job_login = null, @job_password = null, @subscriber_security_mode = 0, @subscriber_login = N'sa', @subscriber_password = N'{1}', @frequency_type = 64, @frequency_interval = 0, @frequency_relative_interval = 0, @frequency_recurrence_factor = 0, @frequency_subday = 0, @frequency_subday_interval = 0, @active_start_time_of_day = 0, @active_end_time_of_day = 235959, @active_start_date = 20080710, @active_end_date = 99991231, @enabled_for_syncmgr = N'False', @dts_package_location = N'Distributor'
GO

data.name: Create.Table
data.value: exec sp_addarticle @publication = N'{0}', @article = N'{1}', @source_owner = N'{2}', @source_object = N'{1}', @type = N'logbased', @description = null, @creation_script = null, @pre_creation_cmd = N'drop', @schema_option = 0x000000000803509F, @identityrangemanagementoption = N'manual', @destination_table = N'{1}', @destination_owner = N'{2}', @vertical_partition = N'false', @ins_cmd = N'CALL sp_MSins_{2}{1}', @del_cmd = N'CALL sp_MSdel_{2}{1}', @upd_cmd = N'SCALL sp_MSupd_{2}{1}' GO

data.name: Delete.Article
data.value: exec sp_dropsubscription @publication = N'{0}', @article = N'{1}', @subscriber = N'all', @destination_db = N'all' exec sp_droparticle @publication = N'{0}', @article = N'{1}', @force_invalidate_snapshot = 1 GO

data.name: Delete.Footer
data.value: -- Dropping the transactional publication exec sp_droppublication @publication = N'{0}' GO

data.name: Delete.Subscriber
data.value: -- Drop subscriber {1} exec sp_dropsubscription @publication = N'{0}', @article = N'all', @subscriber = N'{1}', @destination_db = N'{0}' GO exec sp_dropsubscriber @subscriber = N'{1}' GO
